com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Interface ClassificationMultiModelTrainer

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    ClassificationModelTrainer

    public interface ClassificationMultiModelTrainer
extends ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains multiple models instead of a single model. This allows us to collect features a single time, and process them many times, in cases where feature collection is a costly activity. In order to avoid keeping all models in memory, models will be directly written to disk in a given directory.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Detail

      • trainModels

        void trainModels(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream,
               List<String> featureDescriptors)
        Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        decisionFactory - the decision factory used to convert outcomes labels to Outcomes
        featureDescriptors - the feature descriptors required to apply this model to new data.

      • trainModels

        void trainModels(ClassificationEventStream corpusEventStream,
               Map<String,List<String>> descriptors)
        Return the ClassificationModel trained using the CorpusEventStream provided.
        Parameters:
        corpusEventStream - the event stream containing the events to be used for training
        decisionFactory - the decision factory used to convert outcomes labels to Outcomes
        descriptors - all of the descriptors required to perform analysis using this model (e.g. feature descriptors, etc.)
